com.esri.mo2.map.elt
Class BaseDropshadowLayer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.elt.BaseDropshadowLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, DropshadowLayer
public class BaseDropshadowLayer
extends Object
implements DropshadowLayer

The class BaseDropshadowLayer provides a support of drawing a shadow effect for a given Element. Shadow stlyes are also customizable by changing the color and paint.
